page.title: 10A GAME I ENJOY
page.content: Some of the games we play are played indoors.One of the best I know is{ { MONOPOLY.}For this game you need { {"one playing board,two dice,paper money,six novelty counters,property cards,community chest and chance cards and two or more players.Someone is banker and gives out the money.A dice is shaken and the person with the highest number goes first.You start on go and move the number of squares you shake.If you land on a square that says chance you pick up a chance card.Somtimes you recieve money.Somtimes you loose money.if you land on a street you can buy it.When you have run out of money the other has won the game!This is a good game for a wet and cold winters day or evening.
